item.description:
New Features

  • The content browser now visually indicates points of interest marked as retired

Fixes and Improvements

  • Updates the visual appearance
  • Includes minor updates behind the scenes

New Features

  • Adds export functionality to save the database as a World Entertainment Database (WED) file (File → Export Database…)

Fixes and Improvements

  • Fixes an issue where the default resort and location for new points of interests would be empty
  • Improves the responsiveness of the window while resizing
  • Removes the “Choose Icon…” button in the inspector. The icon itself now acts as a button to open to icon picker popover.
  • Includes various improvements behind the scenes

Fixes and Improvements

  • Adds a “Kiosk” icon and updates the “Aurebesh” icon

New Features

  • Adds “hidden areas” that show contained points of interest on an elevated level
  • Adds a badge displaying the number of points of interest in each category
  • Adds a filter bar for switching between areas and categories
  • Adds app update settings (MAPO → Settings…)
  • Adds a Statistics window (Window → Statistics)

Fixes and Improvements

  • Improves the app’s visual appearance
  • Area groups are now only displayed as selectable section headers
  • Unifies the action buttons across all inspectors

Known Issues

  • After creating an item, it is not automatically selected
  • When creating a new item, the Title Prefix text field is focused instead of the Title text field
  • When creating a new item from the File → New menu, the currently selected items are not used as defaults for the new item. Use the Create Item menu in the toolbar instead
  • The keyboard shortcut for creating a new point of interest is currently only assigned to the toolbar command until using the menu bar command uses the correct defaults for new items. To make the app recognize the keyboard shortcut, the toolbar menu needs to be opened once after launch

New Features

  • Adds icon categories

Fixes and Improvements

  • Improves the visual appearance of the icon picker
  • Displays the prefixes and suffixes of resorts in the sidebar

Known Issues

  • The Save Changes and Revert Changes buttons flash briefly after selecting a point of interest
  • After creating an item, it is not automatically selected
  • When creating a new item, the Title Prefix text field is focused instead of the Title text field
  • When creating a new item from the File → New menu, the currently selected items are not used as defaults for the new item. Use the Create Item menu in the toolbar instead
  • The keyboard shortcut for creating a new point of interest is currently only assigned to the toolbar command until using the menu bar command uses the correct defaults for new items. To make the app recognize the keyboard shortcut, the toolbar menu needs to be opened once after launch
  • The New Location window is initially narrower than intended

New Features

  • Adds new icons and updates existing ones
  • Updates the app icon

Fixes and Improvements

  • Adjusts the padding of icon container views
  • Updates default icons
